full_summary:
**Tender Type**
: ***Tender***


**Title (English)**: W0135-22SA01B - Tailoring Services - CFB North Bay
**Title (French)**: W0135-22SA01B - Services de tailleur - BFC North Bay


**Reference Number**: WS4085749543-Doc4157515019
**Amendment Number**: 0
**Solicitation Number**: WS4085749543


**Publication Date**: August 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023 at 14:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date**: September 27, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: August 15, 2028


**Tender Status**: Expired


**Industry Classification**: 91000000 (Personal and Domestic Services)

**Procurement Details**
: ***Competitive - Open bidding***
**Notice Type**: ***Request for Proposal***
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price


**Contracting Entity**
: ***Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)***

**Scope of Work**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites service providers to submit a proposal for the provision of tailoring services to support the department's needs at 22 Wing CFB North Bay. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing labour, materials, and equipment to deliver the services.

**Key Dates**
Contract Award: September 27, 2023
Contract End Date: August 15, 2028 (with possible extensions for up to two additional one-year periods)

**Contact Information**
Name: Andrew Denbeigh, SPAC/PSPC
Email: andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
